source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_SEQ_00<tab>Urianger is trying to make sense of the strange phenomenon afflicting the residents of Gatetown.
target: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_SEQ_00<tab>ゲートタウンのウリエンジェは、考え込んでいる様子だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_SEQ_01<tab>By all indications, the residents of Gatetown are under Vauthry's mind control, and as Urianger attempts to fathom its workings, Alisaie arrives with your old friend Kai-Shirr in tow. Based on his account of events, it would seem that those who have lived in Gatetown the longest were the first to be affected. All the pieces fall into place when Y'shtola subsequently returns brandishing a loaf of meol. With dread and disbelief, Ryne immediately recognizes the Eulmoran staple for what it is: sin eater flesh, the consumption of which apparently renders one susceptible to Vauthry's influence. This sickening revelation leaves everyone aghast, but the horrors do not end there... Recalling the words you heard during your first visit to Eulmore, Alphinaud shares his suspicion that citizens who have outlived their usefulness are being deliberately turned into sin eaters. Suppressing the urge to gag, you endeavor to put such thoughts from your mind, and concentrate instead on the task at hand: hunting down the Lightwarden. The being is all but certain to be hiding in Eulmore's upper levels, and it is decided that you will lead the charge into the city.
target: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_SEQ_01<tab>仲間たちとカイ・シルの協力によって、異変の元凶が露わになってきた。ゲートタウンの「アルフィノ」と話し、ユールモアに突入しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_SEQ_02<tab>Together with your comrades, you sally forth into Eulmore.

TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_SEQ_03<tab>While the others keep Vauthry's thralls at bay, you press on to the Canopy, where you are confronted by a lone Ran'jit. Driven by a resolve all his own, the old soldier brings the sum of his might to bear against you, but you narrowly emerge the victor, striking him down once and for all. Rejoined by your comrades, you then ascend to the Emergent and find Vauthry having dinner in his chamber. There, Ryne finally realizes that <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> is the Lightwarden, being an unholy mixture of man and sin eater. Before you are able to act, however, Vauthry sprouts wings and takes to the skies. Rushing to the balcony, you are met with an impossible sight: the peak of Mt. Gulg, torn from the earth and floating in the heavens. It is there that Vauthry appears to have fled. With your quarry out of reach, you decide to suspend the hunt, that you might instead render aid to the casualties of the battle.
target: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_SEQ_03<tab>元首の執務室に到着したが、ヴァウスリーには逃げられてしまった。ユールモアのエーテライト・プラザ付近にいる「サンクレッド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_SEQ_04<tab>To your relief, Thancred informs you that Ryne is able to counteract the effects of Vauthry's mind control, and is busy tending to the afflicted one by one. There are, however, countless wounded requiring attention, and you are asked to assist in the relief effort.
target: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_SEQ_04<tab>サンクレッドと話した。不幸中の幸いか、リーンの力で、ヴァウスリーによる精神干渉は解くことができるようだ。アルフィノの願いに応じ、ユールモアの混乱を収束させよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_000<tab>The gears are clearly turning in Urianger's mind. Why don't you ask him what he makes of all this?
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_000ウリエンジェからも、所感を聞いてみるといい。
……どうにも雲行きが怪しいな。

TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RESIDENT03630_000_005み、みんなの様子がおかしいんだ……！
何がどうなっちまったんだよ！？

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALISAIE_000_010<tab>I'm fine, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Shaking with fury, but fine. Let's go.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALISAIE_000_010大丈夫、行けるわ……最高に頭にキてるけどね……！
人の命を、いったい何だと思ってるのよ……っ！

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_015<tab>We are like to encounter Ran'jit again. One can only hope he's still licking his wounds.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_015ここがユールモア軍との決戦の地なら、
ランジートもいる可能性がある。
俺との戦いの影響が、まだ残っててくれると嬉しいが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_016<tab>Yet even without him, Eulmore is an eminently defensible city─as you doubtless gleaned during your visit.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_016そうでなくとも、あの街は形状からして攻めがたい……。
かつて侵入したときには、まさに、
第一世界のリムサ・ロミンサだと感じたものさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_017<tab>When last I set foot inside its walls, I almost mistook it for dear old Limsa─but it is <var 1A 02 /var>full<var 1A 01 /var> of unpleasant surprises. All of which is a long way of saying: be on your guard.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_017我らが海都の方が、「多少」荒々しく、たくましいが……
油断せずに行こう、)) (( )) 02 /var>。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RYNE_000_020<tab>The uppermost level of the city houses Vauthry's chambers. He must keep the Warden close.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RYNE_000_020ユールモアの最上階……
つまり「樹葉の層」にあるのは、ヴァウスリーの部屋。
そんな場所に、大罪喰いが……？

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_URIANGER_000_025<tab>My heart is gripped by an unshakable sense of foreboding. Let us proceed with all care.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_URIANGER_000_025……嫌な予感がいたします。
逸る気持ちはあれど、どうか、ご注意を。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_YSHTOLA_000_030<tab>That Vauthry should so brazenly exert his influence over the people bespeaks his desperation. He will not go quietly.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_YSHTOLA_000_030ヴァウスリーとて、
意味もなく住民たちに精神干渉はしないでしょう。
……中は、かなり厄介なことになっていそうね。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_KAISHIRR_000_035<tab>Meol...is sin eater? Wicked white, we all scoffed the stuff without a second thought...
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_KAISHIRR_000_035メオルが罪喰いの肉……？
そんな……だって、みんな食べて…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_KAISHIRR_000_036<tab>I never got near as much as the others, but...ugh...
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_KAISHIRR_000_036俺だって食べたけど、疑問なんて何も……。
……でも、確かに俺はもらえる量がとても少なかったから、
大半の日は、野草や魚を採ってしのいでたんです。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_KAISHIRR_000_037<tab>Heh... The bitter greens and bony fish I got by on don't seem so bad no more...
target: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_KAISHIRR_000_037<tab>それが……こんな結果になるなんて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>When we step through the gates, we shall find not the place of hedonistic pleasure we remember, but a battlefield.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_000_040恐らく、あの門の向こうには、
もはや優雅な音楽も、煌びやかな暮らしもあるまい……。
危険だから、カイ・シルはここで待っていてもらおう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_000_041<tab>If you are prepared for this, then let us sally forth!
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_051<tab>The citizens appear to have calmed down for the moment. I can only assume Vauthry is otherwise engaged. Let's get to the upper level while we can.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_051操られた住民たちの波も、一旦途切れた。
今のうちに、最上階へ突入するぞ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>My thanks again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We will seek out the wounded and render what aid we can.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_000_060時間をくれて、ありがとう。
怪我人は、見つけ次第、治療していくよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALISAIE_000_065<tab>Some managed to shake off the mind control only to be caught in the chaos. We'll make sure they receive treatment as well.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALISAIE_000_065操られなかった人の中にも、
騒乱に巻き込まれて、怪我した人がいるみたい。
気をつけて見回ってみるわ。
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RYNE_000_070<tab>大丈夫……あなたの心を縛る術を今、解きます……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_URIANGER_000_080<tab>Bereft of leadership, the soldiers have lost the will to fight. They pose no threat to us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_URIANGER_000_080ユールモア軍は、指揮官を失い、完全に戦意喪失しています。
もはや脅威となることはないでしょう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_YSHTOLA_000_085<tab>So this was how the citizens lived─the Eulmoran dream. They are in for quite a rude awakening.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_YSHTOLA_000_085なるほど……ユールモアの人々がどんな暮らしをしてたか、
ここを見るだけでもよくわかるわ。
これからが大変そうね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_090<tab>Good news, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It would seem that Ryne is indeed able to reverse the effects of Vauthry's influence.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_090)) (( )) 02 /var>、朗報だ。
やってみたところ、ヴァウスリーが市民に掛けた精神支配は、
リーンでも解くことができるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_091<tab>Even as we speak, she tends to the afflicted in turn. The problem being: there's no end to them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_091対処はもうはじめているが、ほかにも怪我人だのなんだの、
俺たちが総出で働いても手が足りていない。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_092<tab>We're trying to provide what relief we can to those who are waiting, and would appreciate your help, if you're willing.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_000_092悪いが、お前も力を貸してくれないか？
アルフィノの願いに応えて、ユールモアの混乱を収束させよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_SYSTEM_000_093<tab>You can now attune with the aetheryte in Eulmore!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_SYSTEM_000_093ユールモアの「エーテライト」が利用可能となりました。
忘れずに「交感」しましょう！
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>市民の体力を削り、無力化しろ！
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_QIB_001_TODO_5<tab>兵士の体力を削り、無力化しろ！

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_010<tab>Do no more than is necessary to subdue the civilians!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_010この市民たちを鎮めて、先へ進もう。
体力を削って無力化するんだ！
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_011<tab>すま……ない……私が甘かったようだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_000_020<tab>We're wasting time. Ryne─we hold them here while the others press on!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_000_020)) (( )) 02 /var>たちは、次に隙ができたら先に進め。
俺とリーンは……
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RYNE_BATTLETALK_000_030<tab>はい、ここに残って、操られた市民を抑えます！

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_031<tab>Have care, you two! The rest of you, with me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_031隙ができた……！
この場はサンクレッドたちに任せて、進もう！
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RYNE_BATTLETALK_000_032<tab>ごめん、なさい……うまくできなかった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_040<tab>Their minds are not their own, remember! Avoid harming them wherever possible!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_040兵士たちも、我を失っている……！
ともかく体力を削るんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_YSHTOLA_BATTLETALK_000_050<tab>There is no end to them... Urianger─would you care to make a stand?
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_YSHTOLA_BATTLETALK_000_050止め処ないわね……。
ウリエンジェ、あなたもここに残れて？

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_URIANGER_BATTLETALK_000_060<tab>Gladly. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─pray press on with the others when the opportunity doth arise.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_URIANGER_BATTLETALK_000_060もちろんです。
この一団を鎮めたのち、皆さんは先へ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_000_061<tab>The way's clear! Come on, you two!
target: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_000_061<tab>兵が途切れた！　私たちは先に行くわよ！

TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_URIANGER_BATTLETALK_000_062もうしわけ……ありません……。
加減を誤ったようです……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_070<tab>Confound it! More of them! And we were almost through!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_070くっ、まだいたか……！
しかし、この門さえ突破できれば！

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_000_080<tab>Right, my turn to make a heroic stand! As soon as there's a lull, push on!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_000_080約束どおり、先に行く役目は譲るわ。
次に隙ができたら……いいわね？

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_081<tab>Now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─into the tower! Just you take care, Alisaie!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_081今だ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！　門の中へ！
アリゼーも、どうか無事で！
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_090<tab>あのときの……人買いの道化師たち……！

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_CLOWNOFRED_BATTLETALK_000_100<tab>Apologies, friends...but you've reached a dead end. And on <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> sorry track, there's no turning back.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_CLOWNOFRED_BATTLETALK_000_100ハァ～イ、ここは通行止めだよ！
戻ることも、させないけどね！

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_CLOWNOFBLUE_BATTLETALK_000_110<tab>We've a good life here, see, and we're not about to lose it. But fair's fair─we'll give you a good death.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_CLOWNOFBLUE_BATTLETALK_000_110ボクらにとっては、ここが本当の楽園なんだ。
邪魔者は死んでくれるかな？

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_111<tab>If you would fight us of your own volition, then we will not hold back!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_111……君たちには、戦う意志があると。
ならばこちらも、全力で突破する！

TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_CLOWNOFRED_BATTLETALK_000_120ねえ、おもしろおかしく死なせてあげるよ。
ボクらがそれを、望んだように。

TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_CLOWNOFBLUE_BATTLETALK_000_130さあ、永遠に夢を見るんだ！
覚めないように、殺し合おうッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_140<tab>Let us climb to the Canopy. From there we will take the Crown Lift.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_140……上に進もう。
「樹梢の層」から、クラウンリフトに乗らなくては。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_160<tab>Still more soldiers... Leave them to me and press on!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_000_160まだ兵が残っていたか……！
彼らは私が引き受けるから、君は上へ！

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RANJIT_BATTLETALK_000_170<tab>Ever since I submitted to my master's authority, I have been naught but a weapon.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RANJIT_BATTLETALK_000_170我は、人として、あの男に敗した。
なればこの身は、ただの兵器よ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RANJIT_BATTLETALK_000_180<tab>I exist only to destroy. And destroy you I will.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RANJIT_BATTLETALK_000_180ただ滅し、ただ殺し、ただ朽ちゆく……。
貴様の命も、刈り取ろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RANJIT_BATTLETALK_000_190<tab>It is time we settled this, villain.
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RANJIT_BATTLETALK_000_191<tab>If you would pass me, you must endure all that I have learned on the battlefield... For I am a weapon forged in the fires of war!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RANJIT_BATTLETALK_000_191進みたくば、砕いてみせよ。
永劫の戦場で得た、我が武の極致を……！
TEXT_LUCKME102_03631_RANJIT_BATTLETALK_000_200<tab>ああ……ここにいたか……我が娘たちよ…………。
